name: determinately
content:
determinately adverb
(FIXED)
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal in a way that is clear, fixed, or exact: The question posed can have no determinately correct answer. There is simply no way to correctly and determinately compare such claims. Related word
determinate
More examplesFewer examplesNot every feature of an object is clearly and determinately presented to me; some features are unclear.The male speaker enters as a recognizable or determinately male voice.Is it possible to judge whether a cup of tea tastes determinately better than a cup of coffee?
